word:
The people about here have raised no vegetables, and but little fruit, except a few oranges and lemons that are not cultivated, and I have seen a few peach trees. Land is profitless, but in the land boom it cost eight pounds an acre, some of which now sells for four. Thousands of acres lie 


                                    -94- 

untouched; for no one attempts to work the land. They think it will yield nothing, but we know it will yield if properly cultivated.
